overview:
Road to Value is dedicated to helping entrepreneurs, management teams, investors and tech institutes, create value from idea validation to exit realization.

The ability of a company to earn future cash flow (shareholder value) is the best way to measure the value of a company, if all stakeholders are committed to the company in a sustainable way. We help to identify, enable, and realize shareholder value in all stages of the company life cycle.

The life & value of any investment is characterized by five defining steps. Road to Value is determined to make each step a success, as stand alone project, or as an integrated program:

  1. Idea validation
  2. Deal structuring
  3. Value creation
  4. Turn around
  5. Exit

Road to Value works by combining a professional investor toolbox with hands on experience in numerous investment processes. We always work from the perspective that value is created over the long term by 10% inspiration and 90% transpiration.

Key industry focus on healthcare, clean tech, food and ICT.
